name.ja: <ruby>超<rt>ちょう</rt></ruby><ruby>越<rt>えつ</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>エグザラプトル

text.en:
2+ Dinosaur monsters, including a Level 6 or higher monster
If this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Dinosaur monster from your hand. If a face-up Dinosaur monster(s) this card points to is destroyed by battle or sent to the GY: You can draw 1 card. If this card is destroyed: You can shuffle 1 Normal Monster from your GY into the Deck, then you can Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Transcendosaurus Exaraptor" once per turn.

materials: 2+ Dinosaur monsters, including a Level 6 or higher monster
